name: Encore
headline: Conversational search and discovery for secondhand products
description: Encore is your go-to online shopping assistant for finding secondhand treasures. Our conversational search platform makes it easy and fun to browse platforms like Depop, eBay, Grailed, and Poshmark‚Äîall in one place. Whether you‚Äôre after styling tips, honest reviews, trend ideas, or tracking down that cool piece you saw in a movie or on social media, we‚Äôve got you covered. Shopping should feel like having a personal expert by your side, helping you discover things you‚Äôll truly love. With Encore, browsing becomes easy, fun, and actually rewarding.

founders.name: Alex Ruber, Co-Founder and CEO
founders.description:
Co-founder of Encore - the future of discovery-driven shopping. 

Prior to this, was an iOS/Arch engineer at Apple, and a flight engineering intern at NASA (JPL) 

Hobbies: Soccer, Surfing, F1, AI/ML, iOS

founders.name: Parth Chopra, Co-Founder and CTO
founders.description:
Co-founder & CTO of Encore - the future of discovery-driven shopping. Prior to this, worked on ads relevance & ranking @ Twitter, and architected changes to the sharing/permissions framework @ Asana.

Hobbies: math, thrifting, discovering new music, 3B1B youtube videos, cutting hair

generated_description:
### Encore: Your Personal Secondhand Shopping Assistant

**Mission**: At its core, Encore is redefining how we search for and discover secondhand products. The company aims to bring a fresh, conversational approach to thrift shopping, making it engaging and easy for users to find hidden gems across various platforms.

**Overview**: Founded in 2024, Encore emerged from the Y Combinator Batch F24 with a vision to be your online shopping assistant dedicated solely to uncovering secondhand treasures. The platform aggregates listings from popular sites like Depop, eBay, Grailed, and Poshmark into a single, user-friendly interface. This way, whether you‚Äôre hunting for styling tips, personal recommendations, or that elusive item you spotted in a film, Encore positions itself as the expert companion you didn‚Äôt know you needed.

**Location & Team**: Based in San Francisco, Encore operates with a compact team of just two employees. This lean structure allows for agile decision-making and innovation.

**Leadership**: Encore is guided by the insights of Pete Koomen, their Group Partner, who brings valuable experience to the table.

**What They Offer**: Encore's platform features an intuitive search function that encourages exploration and discovery. Users can browse trending items, get inspired by community picks, and contribute to a vibrant shopping environment. The site showcases various categories‚Äîfrom clothing to collectibles‚Äîensuring that on any visit, shoppers find something that catches their eye.

**Tagline**: Think of it as shopping with a savvy friend who knows all the best spots and can help you track down anything you desire‚Äîall while embracing the sustainable charm of secondhand goods.

**Visit Encore**: Ready to dive into a world of secondhand treasures? Check them out at [Encore's website](https://www.shopencore.ai/).

Engaging with Encore feels like having a personal shopper who not only understands your style but is also plugged into the latest trends, all while encouraging a more sustainable form of consumerism. It's shopping reimagined‚Äîinteractive, personalized, and undeniably fun.
